tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: Remember the Feb 28th case we analyzed in the previous tutorial? This is it! This is the position we got from the rules defined!

paragraphs.text: Take a moment to study what the simulation object layers show!
Let's turn on a few more Simulation Object layers: Trigger, Open, Manage, and Close Stages!

We can now see the four stages in action. Take a minute to read and interpret the graphics. Try to follow the timeline implicit in the drawings of the stages. See when and why each stage opens and closes...
